channel.title: Some tips for your RSPS
channel.description:
hey, I didnt know if this would be any use to anybody but i think it mite.
if you have just started up your server here are a few tips:
[ul][li]Don't have the words "RuneScape" or "Jagex" anywere on your server or your server's site. - Anysite with the words RuneScape and Jagex lets the Jagex mods access your site bypassing any Terms of Service.[/li] [li]Don't have the "blackmarket" section on your server's site. - Also accessable by Jagex mods, bypassing any Terms of Service.[/li] [li]When taking money in, always call it "Donating" and when "Donating" don't say "Donate for this item" always have it something like "Donate and get free items!". - Jagex can shut down and maybe sue you for taking money thats right-fully theres.[/li][/ul]
This list is to help you to Never get watched by Jagex mods

item.title: Some tips for your RSPS

item.description:

Unrelated to server help, ya?

Read full topic

item.title: Some tips for your RSPS
item.dc:creator: @nubers nubers
item.description:
@nubers wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:4, topic:365474”]What the hell is with people these days posting random shit all the time??

This doesnt deserve to be locked , it needs to bo deleted.

Sorry though. Its how it is.[/quote]

yes im waiting for a staff member to delete it, but what i wrote should be stickied somewere, folow those simple rules and you wont get hassled by jagex mods.

Read full topic

@nubers wrote:

hey, I didnt know if this would be any use to anybody but i think it mite.

if you have just started up your server here are a few tips:

[ul][li]Don’t have the words “RuneScape” or “Jagex” anywere on your server or your server’s site. - Anysite with the words RuneScape and Jagex lets the Jagex mods access your site bypassing any Terms of Service.[/li]
[li]Don’t have the “blackmarket” section on your server’s site. - Also accessable by Jagex mods, bypassing any Terms of Service.[/li]
[li]When taking money in, always call it “Donating” and when “Donating” don’t say “Donate for this item”
always have it something like “Donate and get free items!”. - Jagex can shut down and maybe sue you for taking money thats right-fully theres.[/li][/ul]

This list is to help you to Never get watched by Jagex mods
